result.arabic_text: ۞ وَسَارِعُوٓاْ إِلَىٰ مَغۡفِرَةٖ مِّن رَّبِّكُمۡ وَجَنَّةٍ عَرۡضُهَا ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتُ وَٱلۡأَرۡضُ أُعِدَّتۡ لِلۡمُتَّقِينَ
result.translation: 133. Una degdega denbi dhaaf xagga Rabbigiin ah iyo Beer (Janno) ballaceedu le'eg yahay samooyinka iyo arlada, loo diyaariyey kuwa iska ilaasha (shirkiga iyo xumaha kale ee dhowra Amarrada Alle).
